name: Popularmoviesapp
tagline: Popular Movies Tabet App to  explore latest movies backed by data from The MovieDB API.
body:
# PopularMovies Popular Movies android app for project submission in android nanodegree program at udacity.
  1. Consuming The Movie Database Api
  2. Material Design Implementation
  3. Multiscreen Tablet support
  4. Content Providers
  5. MVP Architecture Implmentation
## Api key is stored via gradle file , you need to add the movie database api key to built and run this app. # Screenshots
## Download APK
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
